channel.title: Michele Tizzoni
channel.description:
Based on the Centrarium template by Ben Centra.

Header image by Jean-Pierre Dalbéra.

All the content CC unless otherwise noted.

item.title: RAPIDD workshop
item.description: From September 6 to September 9, I will be in Cambridge, UK, to join a RAPIDD workshop on Gravity Models, Disease Spread and Spatial Scales.

item.title: New manuscript
item.description: The Scaling of Human Contacts in Reaction-Diffusion Processes on Heterogeneous Metapopulation Networks by Tizzoni M, Sun K, Benusiglio D, Karsai M, Perra N.

item.title: CECAM workshop
item.description: I presented a contributed talk titled “Competing epidemic processes on temporal networks” at the CECAM workshop: Recognizing the Relevance of Change: Analysis and Control of Time-evolving Networks in Epidemiology and Evolutionary Medicine. .
